nodes.text: The cantina was a popular establishment in the town of Nashal on the planet of Talus.

The cantina was situated only few meters from the banks of the Mephyt River, not far from the city's spaceport. It had two entrances, one in the front and one in the back. The cantina consisted of a large room with a long, U-shaped bar counter in the middle of the room where a bartender sold beverages. Six large booths along the walls provided tables and chairs where people could sit down, drink and listen to the music. A door behind the bar led to a small back room that wasn't in use as of 1 ABY. Another room in the back of the cantina gave special patrons a little privacy from the other patrons' prying eyes.
Among the beverages available at the bar were Adumari beer, Lopez Softdrink, Ardees Beverage tea, milk and imported Utozz.
A bartender and the Ithorian chef Oecax worked in this cantina.
Among the beings who visited this cantina regularly in 1 ABY were the Bith Sigrix Slix and the Drall Green Laser. The revived Durge temporarily hid in the back room of the cantina.

This cantina is a location in Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. Various NPCs can be found here that players have to talk to during quests. It also provides a place for players of the entertainer profession to perform their music and dancing acts and give out buffs.
